[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, draw up to 1 card.

[A] CX COMBO [Discard a "Girlfriend Mode" or "Please Go Out With Me!!" from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a "Girlfriend Mode" or "Please Go Out With Me!!" from Waiting Room and return it to hand.

If so, look at up to 3 card from the top of your Opponent's Library, choose up to 3 cards from among them, put them on top of your Opponent's Library in any order, and put the remainder in their Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, put the top 2 cards of your Library in the Waiting Room, and this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times # of ::Rent-A-Girlfriend:: Characters among those cards.
[A] [(1) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Rent-A-Girlfriend:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand, choose 1 of your other ::Rent-A-Girlfriend:: Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.

[C] During your turn, your other Character in your Front Row Center Slot gains +1000 Power and the following ability. "[C] This cannot be chosen by your Opponent's effects."

[A] CX COMBO When "Want to Go Out with Me" is placed in your Climax Zone, if you have 2 or more other ::Rent-A-Girlfriend:: Characters, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 ::Rent-A-Girlfriend:: Character from among them, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room.

[C] If there are 2 or fewer Climax cards in your Waiting Room, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
